job.title: Scala Engineer
job.description: pstrongJava Functional Scala EngineerstrongppstrongNew York City NY and San Francisco CAstrongppstrong6MonthsstrongppstrongstrongppstrongRequirementsstrongppStrong experience with functional programming languages Scala Clojure Haskell or Common LispppExperience with one or more functional libraries or similar ZIO Cats andor MonixppExperience with cloud computing AWS Microsoft Azure Google CloudppbrppstrongDay to day responsibilitiesstrongppThis role will contribute to building a modern system of record platform for financial data including software development code reviews design discussions work planning and prioritizationnbspThe platform is written in functional Scala and extensively utilizesppthe ZIO librarynbspThe role would also involvenbspmentoring lessexperienced team members in functionalnbspScala and software development techniques and best practicesnbspBusiness hour oncall support and troubleshooting are also part of the rolep
